analysis.description:
BctTokenAirdrop.transferToken (/unique_chucks/27/0xa877302a06b2f6f38e87da4df8d6b40a2768d6c7.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(users[i],values[i]) (/unique_chucks/27/0xa877302a06b2f6f38e87da4df8d6b40a2768d6c7.sol)

BctTokenAirdrop.transferToken has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(users[i],values[i]) (/unique_chucks/27/0xa877302a06b2f6f38e87da4df8d6b40a2768d6c7.sol)
BlockchainToken.INITIAL_SUPPLY should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0xa877302a06b2f6f38e87da4df8d6b40a2768d6c7.sol#323-329)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0xa877302a06b2f6f38e87da4df8d6b40a2768d6c7.sol#38-43) should be declared external
